ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games
UnityApp/Assets/Scripts/UnityApp/SessionController.cs
1 
9 using System;
10 using System.Linq;
11 using System.Collections.Generic;
12 using UnityEngine;
13 using ColorShapeLinks.Common;
14 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI;
15 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.Session;
16 
17 namespace ColorShapeLinks.UnityApp
18 {
31  public class SessionController : MonoBehaviour,
32  IMatchDataProvider, IMatchConfig, IMatchViewConfig,
33  IUnitySessionDataProvider, ISessionConfig
34  {
35 
36  // ///////////////////////////////////////////////// //
37  // Match properties configurable in the Unity editor //
38  // ///////////////////////////////////////////////// //
39  [Header("Match properties")]
40 
42  [SerializeField] private int rows = 6;
43 
45  [SerializeField] private int cols = 7;
46 
48  [SerializeField] private int winSequence = 4;
49 
51  [SerializeField] private int roundPiecesPerPlayer = 10;
52 
54  [SerializeField] private int squarePiecesPerPlayer = 11;
55 
57  [SerializeField] private float lastMoveAnimLength = 1f;
58 
59  // ////////////////////////////////////////////// //
60  // AI properties configurable in the Unity editor //
61  // ////////////////////////////////////////////// //
62  [Header("AI properties")]
63 
65  [Tooltip("Maximum real time in seconds that AI can take to play")]
66  [SerializeField] private float aITimeLimit = 0.5f;
67 
73  [Tooltip("Even if the AI plays immediately, this time (in seconds) "
74  + "gives the illusion that the AI took some minimum time to play")]
75  [SerializeField] private float minAIGameMoveTime = 0.25f;
76 
77  // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //
78  // Tournament properties configurable in the Unity editor //
79  // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //
80  [Header("Tournament properties")]
81 
83  [SerializeField] private int pointsPerWin = 3;
84 
86  [SerializeField] private int pointsPerDraw = 1;
87 
89  [SerializeField] private int pointsPerLoss = 0;
90 
92  [SerializeField] private bool pressButtonBeforeMatch = false;
93 
95  [SerializeField] private bool pressButtonAfterMatch = false;
96 
101  [SerializeField] private float unblockedScreenDuration = 1.5f;
102 
103  // The session state of the session state machine
104  private SessionState state;
105 
106  // Reference to the session view
107  private SessionView view;
108 
109  // Reference to the match prefab (match controller + view + board model)
110  private GameObject matchPrefab = null;
111 
112  // Reference to the current match instance, created from the match
113  // prefab
114  private GameObject matchInstance = null;
115 
116  // Reference to the match controller associated with the current match
117  // instance
118  private MatchController matchController = null;
119 
120  // Reference to the current match (thinker 1 + thinker 2)
121  private Match currentMatch;
122 
123  // Reference to the game board in the current match instance
124  private Board currentBoard;
125 
126  // The session instance manages the matches to be played and the
127  // tournament standings
128  // It's the model in this MVC implementation
129  private Session session;
130 
131  // Thinkers in current match
132  private IThinker[] currentThinkers;
133 
134  // Variables which define how several session UI screens will behave
135  private bool uiWhoPlaysFirst;
136  private bool uiBlockStartNextMatch;
137  private bool uiBlockShowResult;
138 
139  // Awake is called when the script instance is being loaded
140  private void Awake()
141  {
142  // Get all AIs and put them in a list
143  List<AIPlayer> allAIs = new List<AIPlayer>();
144  GetComponents(allAIs);
145 
146  // Get the thinkers associated with the active AIs
147  IList<ThinkerPrototype> activeThinkers = allAIs
148  .Where(ai => ai.IsActive)
149  .Select(ai => ai.ThinkerPrototype)
150  .ToList();
151 
152  // A human thinker prototype, in case there aren't enough
153  // thinkers
154  IThinkerPrototype humanPrototype = new HumanThinkerPrototype();
155 
156  // Instantiate the current thinkers array
157  currentThinkers = new IThinker[2];
158 
159  // Load the match prefab
160  matchPrefab = Resources.Load<GameObject>("Prefabs/Match");
161 
162  // Get reference to the UI (session view)
163  view = GetComponent<SessionView>();
164 
165  // Set the session state to Begin
166  state = SessionState.Begin;
167 
168  // Setup session depending on how many AIs will play
169  if (activeThinkers.Count == 0)
170  {
171  // A game between human players
172  uiWhoPlaysFirst = false;
173  uiBlockStartNextMatch = true;
174  uiBlockShowResult = true;
175  session = new Session(
176  new IThinkerPrototype[] {
177  humanPrototype,
178  humanPrototype },
179  this);
180  }
181  else if (activeThinkers.Count == 1)
182  {
183  // A game between a human and an AI
184  uiWhoPlaysFirst = true;
185  uiBlockStartNextMatch = true;
186  uiBlockShowResult = true;
187  session = new Session(
188  new IThinkerPrototype[] {
189  humanPrototype,
190  activeThinkers[0] },
191  this);
192  }
193  else if (activeThinkers.Count == 2)
194  {
195  // A game between two AIs, ask who plays first
196  uiWhoPlaysFirst = true;
197  uiBlockStartNextMatch = true;
198  uiBlockShowResult = true;
199  session = new Session(
200  new IThinkerPrototype[] {
201  activeThinkers[0],
202  activeThinkers[1] },
203  this);
204  }
205  else
206  {
207  // Multiple AIs, run a complete tournament
208  uiWhoPlaysFirst = false;
209  uiBlockStartNextMatch = pressButtonBeforeMatch;
210  uiBlockShowResult = pressButtonAfterMatch;
211  session = new Session(activeThinkers, this, true);
212  }
213 
214  // Get the next match
215  if (!session.NextMatch(out currentMatch))
216  {
217  throw new InvalidOperationException(
218  "Session does not contain matches");
219  }
220  }
221 
222  // This function is called when the object becomes enabled and active
223  private void OnEnable()
224  {
225  // Register listener methods to UI events
226  view.PreMatch += PreMatchCallback;
227  view.SwapPlayers += SwapPlayersCallback;
228  view.StartNextMatch += StartNextMatchCallback;
229  view.MatchClear += DestroyAndIterateMatchCallback;
230  view.EndSession += EndSessionCallback;
231  }
232 
233  // This function is called when the behaviour becomes disabled
234  private void OnDisable()
235  {
236  // Unregister listener methods from UI events
237  view.PreMatch -= PreMatchCallback;
238  view.SwapPlayers -= SwapPlayersCallback;
239  view.StartNextMatch -= StartNextMatchCallback;
240  view.MatchClear -= DestroyAndIterateMatchCallback;
241  view.EndSession -= EndSessionCallback;
242  }
243 
244  // Change the session state to PreMatch
245  private void PreMatchCallback()
246  {
247  state = SessionState.PreMatch;
248  }
249 
250  // Swap current match players
251  private void SwapPlayersCallback()
252  {
253  currentMatch = currentMatch.Swapped;
254  }
255 
256  // Start next match, changing session state to InMatch
257  private void StartNextMatchCallback()
258  {
259  // Instantiate a board for the next match
260  currentBoard = new Board(rows, cols, winSequence,
261  roundPiecesPerPlayer, squarePiecesPerPlayer);
262 
263  // Instantiate thinkers for next match
264  currentThinkers[(int)PColor.White] =
265  currentMatch.thinkerWhite.Create();
266  currentThinkers[(int)PColor.Red] =
267  currentMatch.thinkerRed.Create();
268 
269  // Wire-up Debug.Log as thinker listener
270  currentThinkers[(int)PColor.White].ThinkingInfo += Debug.Log;
271  currentThinkers[(int)PColor.Red].ThinkingInfo += Debug.Log;
272 
273  // Instantiate the next match
274  matchInstance = Instantiate(matchPrefab, transform);
275  matchInstance.name = currentMatch.ToString();
276 
277  // Get a reference to the match controller of the next match
278  matchController = matchInstance.GetComponent<MatchController>();
279 
280  // Add a listener for the match over event
281  matchController.MatchOver.AddListener(EndCurrentMatchCallback);
282 
283  // Set session state to InMatch
284  state = SessionState.InMatch;
285  }
286 
287  // End current match an change session state to PostMatch
288  private void EndCurrentMatchCallback()
289  {
290  // Keep result of current match
291  session.SetResult(matchController.Result);
292 
293  // Set session state to PostMatch
294  state = SessionState.PostMatch;
295  }
296 
297  // Destroy old match instance and check if there are more matches to
298  // play. If so, get next match and update state to PreMatch. Otherwise,
299  // dispose of the match enumerator and update session state to End.
300  private void DestroyAndIterateMatchCallback()
301  {
302  // Destroy old match instance
303  Destroy(matchInstance);
304 
305  // Are there more matches to play?
306  if (session.NextMatch(out currentMatch))
307  {
308  // If so, get next match and set session state to PreMatch
309  state = SessionState.PreMatch;
310  }
311  else
312  {
313  // Otherwise, dispose of the match enumerator and set session
314  // state to End
315  state = SessionState.End;
316  }
317  }
318 
319  // Terminate the session
320  private void EndSessionCallback()
321  {
322  UnityEditor.EditorApplication.isPlaying = false;
323  }
324 
325  // //////////////////////////////////// //
326  // Implementation of IMatchDataProvider //
327  // //////////////////////////////////// //
328 
331  public Board Board => currentBoard;
332 
335  public IThinker CurrentThinker =>
336  currentThinkers[(int)currentBoard.Turn];
337 
340  public IThinker GetThinker(PColor thinkerColor) =>
341  currentThinkers[(int)thinkerColor];
342 
343  // ///////////////////////////// //
344  // Implementation of IMatchConfig //
345  // ///////////////////////////// //
346 
349  public int Rows => rows;
350 
353  public int Cols => cols;
354 
357  public int WinSequence => winSequence;
358 
361  public int RoundPiecesPerPlayer => roundPiecesPerPlayer;
362 
365  public int SquarePiecesPerPlayer => squarePiecesPerPlayer;
366 
369  public int TimeLimitMillis => (int)(aITimeLimit * 1000);
370 
373  public float TimeLimitSeconds => aITimeLimit;
374 
377  public int MinMoveTimeMillis => (int)(minAIGameMoveTime * 1000);
378 
381  public float MinMoveTimeSeconds => minAIGameMoveTime;
382 
383  // ////////////////////////////////// //
384  // Implementation of IMatchViewConfig //
385  // ////////////////////////////////// //
386 
389  public float LastMoveAnimLength => lastMoveAnimLength;
390 
391  // /////////////////////////////////////////// //
392  // Implementation of IUnitySessionDataProvider //
393  // /////////////////////////////////////////// //
394 
397  public SessionState State => state;
398 
401  public ISessionConfig SessionConfig => this;
402 
405  public IMatchConfig MatchConfig => this;
406 
409  public Match CurrentMatch => currentMatch;
410 
413  public IEnumerable<Match> Matches => session;
414 
417  public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<Match, Winner>> Results =>
418  session.GetResults();
419 
422  public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, int>> Standings =>
423  session.GetStandings();
424 
427  public Winner LastMatchResult => matchController?.Result ?? Winner.None;
428 
431  public string WinnerString => matchController?.WinnerString;
432 
435  public bool WhoPlaysFirst => uiWhoPlaysFirst;
436 
439  public bool BlockStartNextMatch => uiBlockStartNextMatch;
440 
443  public bool BlockShowResult => uiBlockShowResult;
444 
447  public float UnblockedScreenDuration => unblockedScreenDuration;
448 
449  // //////////////////////////////// //
450  // Implementation of ISessionConfig //
451  // //////////////////////////////// //
452 
455  public int PointsPerWin => pointsPerWin;
456 
459  public int PointsPerLoss => pointsPerLoss;
460 
463  public int PointsPerDraw => pointsPerDraw;
464  }
